fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Turn someone into a cute cat at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first person a cat visits will be turned into a cute cat.
- You know all cute cats.
- Cute cats must say ":3" in every message. If they do not, they get struck by lightning 9 times (overkill attack).
- Once you die, cute cats no longer convert people, and no longer have to say ":3" in every message.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: All living players are cute cats. You can win while dead.
